column1: #Text=Twelve dead in shooting at offices of French satirical magazine Charlie
#Text=At least twelve people have been killed today in a shooting at the Paris offices of the satirical weekly French magazine Charlie Hebdo .

#Text=Three men in hoods armed with Kalashnikov rifles entered the magazine 's office in the 11th arrondissement and shot dead ten journalists and two police officers before making a getaway in a car driven by a fourth collaborator .
#Text=Five people have been seriously injured in the attack .
#Text=A member of the police said after leaving the scene the attackers drove to the northeastern suburbs of Paris where they abandoned their vehicle and hijacked another car .
#Text=French police union Unité spokesman Rocco Contento said of the crime scene , " it was a real butchery " .
#Text=The French Government have raised the country 's security level to the maximum .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=This is a terrorist attack , there is no doubt about it  .

column1: #Text=Gerard Biard , the editor-in-chief of Charlie Hebdo , stated :

#Text=In 2011 , it published another cartoon depiction of Muhammed subtitled  Charia Hebdo " , a pun on sharia .

column1: #Text=Following the bombing , the magazine 's website was hacked and death threats were made against their staff .
#Text=The magazine responded by publishing on their front page an image showing both the remains of the magazine 's offices and one of their cartoonists kissing a bearded Muslim man .
#Text=The cover contained the headline " Love is stronger than hate " ( ( fr))French language : ‍L'Amour plus fort que la haine .
